Civic Engagement During COVID-19 (Part 2) 🏛

Oct 7, 2020

  • civictech
  • episode
  • govtech
  • civic engagement
  • government
  • covid-19

This is the second of two episodes where we’ll talk to folks who are leading organizations trying to make civic involvement easier despite the constraints of COVID-19. For this one, we’re joined by Maria Yuan to chat with us about their platform IssueVoter which seeks to inform folks about Congress and empower them to connect with its members.
